summary: Vim plugin that transforms text with the Accentuate.us web service
name: accentuate.vim
description:
Accentuate is a Vim plugin that uses the Accentuate.us web service to restore
accents and special characters to text in over a hundred languages.

See doc/accentuate.txt in accentuate.zip for detailed documentation.

This plugin is also available on github: https://github.com/wnodom/vim-accentuate
